alert.note: Alert for Four Corners, Upper Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:53PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Montezuma County through 230 PM MDT... At 152 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles southwest of Cortez, or 21 miles north of Shiprock, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Montezuma County, including the following locations... Towaoc. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 491 in Colorado between mile markers 3 and 31. U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 14 and 43. Colorado 145 near mile marker 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
